column4: is there a program so i can use my computer with voice commands :)
try following this tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZOU8GIRUd_g
I heard it might be possible to get dragon natuarlly speaking to work
hehe sorry. if RAdams suggestion doesn't work, look into "voxforge" http://www.voxforge.org/
it works just fine thank you
ah, glad I could help =)
so you do have a working microphone?
ok, then first of all, plug the microophone in and make sure the recording volume is high
yes?
ok, next, right click on your panel, then "add applet", then pick voice contorl
and then what it's on ready and thats all
then just speak into the microphone... I'm trying it right now.... if i yell "firefox firefox firefox", it opens up a text editor! ahahah!
wow, watch out, running that voice control really overheats my processor
it shoes just listening its not opening any thing :D
i think that's just because it isn't very accurate. If you yell enough things at it, sooner or later it does do something
for example, I just yelled "file file file run run file file", and then IRC said, "are you sure you want to quit?" .... so it does do something..... just not what I want
are you crewing with me :D cuz i am screaming my ass :D
is your mic volume turned up? I'm not yelling really loud
wow it opened a firefox :D
did you say "firefox" to do it, or something else entirely?
or you kust need to say COMPUTER first like in star trek :P
One command that always works is "minimize the window"
